course.title: Introduction to JavaScript
course.description: A comprehensive course covering the basics of JavaScript programming language.

modules.title: Module 1: Getting Started
modules.description: Introduction to JavaScript and setting up the development environment.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.content: Basic introduction to JavaScript programming language.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Setting up Development Environment
lessons.content: Instructions on setting up IDEs like Visual Studio Code for JavaScript development.

modules.title: Module 2: Data Types and Variables
modules.description: Understanding data types, variables, and data manipulation in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Data Types
lessons.content: Explanation of primitive and reference data types in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Variables and Constants
lessons.content: Understanding variables, constants, and their usage in JavaScript.

modules.title: Module 3: Control Flow and Functions
modules.description: Learn about control flow statements, loops, and functions in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Conditional Statements
lessons.content: Understanding if, else if, and switch statements in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Loops
lessons.content: Explanation of for, while, and do-while loops in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Lesson 3: Functions
lessons.content: Introduction to functions, parameters, return values, and function expressions in JavaScript.
